Nearly 4 out of 10 mobile users say they abandon their carts during checkout because of difficulty inputting their information.

Startx is a blockchain technology that simplifies data sharing for individuals & businesses on the internet.

We aid web users to be able to fill online forms swiftly and securely by our "Scan to Fill technologies"

A user fill and updates its profile using our Mobile App & Web, then this plugin allows them to scan any online forms and base on their updated information, the form is automatically filled.
